statements: SELECT trade_id, trader_name, trade_amount, settlement_status, trade_date FROM trade_settlement_info;
SELECT trader_name, trade_id, trade_amount FROM trade_settlement_info WHERE settlement_status = 'Completed';
SELECT trader_name, trade_amount FROM trade_settlement_info ORDER BY trade_amount DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trader_name FROM trade_settlement_info WHERE trade_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM trade_settlement_info WHERE settlement_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM trade_settlement_info WHERE trader_name = 'Alice';
SELECT trade_id, trade_amount FROM trade_settlement_info WHERE trade_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY trade_amount DESC;
SELECT trader_name, trade_amount FROM trade_settlement_info WHERE trade_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, settlement_status FROM trade_settlement_info WHERE trader_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT trader_name, COUNT(*) AS total_trades FROM trade_settlement_info GROUP BY trader_name HAVING total_trades > 2 ORDER BY total_trades DESC;
SELECT * FROM trades
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_amount FROM trades
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_amount FROM trades WHERE trade_amount > 1000
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_account FROM trades ORDER BY trade_date DESC
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_account, trade_amount FROM trades WHERE trade_amount < 500
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_amount > 1000 ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trade_account, trade_amount FROM trades WHERE trade_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_account, trade_amount FROM trades JOIN reconciliations ON trades.trade_id = reconciliations.trade_id WHERE reconciliation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT AVG(trade_amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(trade_id) AS total_trades FROM trades GROUP BY trade_account HAVING total_trades > 5;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_account, trade_amount FROM trades WHERE trade_amount < 500 OR trade_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trade_date ASC, trade_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM trade_settlements;
SELECT trade_id, settlement_date, trade_amount FROM trade_settlements WHERE trade_currency='USD' ORDER BY settlement_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, record_date, reconciliation_status FROM reconciliation_records WHERE reconciliation_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT trade_id, settlement_status, trade_currency FROM trade_settlements WHERE trade_currency='EUR';
SELECT * FROM trade_settlements ORDER BY settlement_date DESC, trade_amount ASC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_currency, settlement_status FROM trade_settlements WHERE trade_currency='USD';
SELECT trade_id, settlement_date, settlement_status FROM trade_settlements WHERE settlement_status='pending' OR settlement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT record_id, record_date, reconciliation_status FROM reconciliation_records WHERE reconciliation_status='unresolved' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT trail_id, event_type, event_timestamp, details->>'action' AS action FROM audit_trail WHERE event_type='modification';
SELECT * FROM trade_settlements;
SELECT trade_date, settlement_amount FROM trade_settlements WHERE broker_id = 'c4bb3840-78b5-48f0-af51-7bde8398cbf7';
SELECT MAX(settlement_amount) AS max_settlement_amount, MIN(settlement_amount) AS min_settlement_amount FROM trade_settlements;
SELECT arbitrage_trading.trade_id, buy_amount, sell_amount, profit, trade_date FROM arbitrage_trading JOIN trade_settlements ON trade_settlements.trade_id = arbitrage_trading.trade_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM reconciliation_records WHERE discrepancy_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM trade_settlements ORDER BY trade_date DESC, settlement_amount ASC
SELECT trade_id, settlement_amount FROM trade_settlements WHERE broker_id = 'xyz123'
SELECT record_id, trade_id, discrepancy_amount FROM reconciliation_records WHERE record_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01'
SELECT audit_id, action, user_id FROM audit_trail WHERE action = 'UPDATE' ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC
SELECT trade_id, profit FROM arbitrage_trading WHERE buy_amount > 10000 AND sell_amount < 5000
SELECT * FROM trade_settlement_information;
SELECT trade_date, settlement_amount FROM trade_settlement_information WHERE settlement_status='Completed';
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trading_amount FROM arbitrage_trading ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, audit_type FROM audit_trail WHERE trade_id=1001;
SELECT counterparty_id, counterparty_name, counterparty_type FROM counterparty_info;
SELECT * FROM trade_settlement_information WHERE settlement_amount > 1000
SELECT trade_id, trade_date FROM trade_settlement_information ORDER BY trade_date DESC
SELECT * FROM arbitrage_trading WHERE trading_amount < 5000 ORDER BY trading_amount ASC
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trading_status FROM arbitrage_trading WHERE trading_status = 'Active'
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, settlement_status FROM trade_settlement_information WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
